trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several layout-oriented user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un controllo editor che consente agli utenti di modificare diverse proprietà dell'interfaccia utente orientate al layout su un oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the layout of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: La classe LayoutEditorPart è un controllo editor che deriva dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>e viene utilizzata per modificare le proprietà che interessano il layout di un oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone.
trans-unit.target: Oltre alle aree di strumento in set di controlli Web part (per informazioni dettagliate, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>Cenni preliminari sulla classe), sono disponibili i controlli Web part orientati agli strumenti (tool part) e ogni deve risiedere in un determinato tipo di zona strumenti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Tali parti nel set di controlli Web part presentano due caratteristiche distintive:-sono controlli di supporto che consentono agli utenti finali di personalizzare i controlli in una pagina Web part.

trans-unit.source: - They are visible only in certain display modes.
trans-unit.target: -Sono visibili solo in determinate modalità di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo LayoutEditorPart fa parte dello strumento che diventa visibile solo quando una pagina Web part è in modalità di modifica e quando un oggetto specifico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo è stato selezionato per la modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo LayoutEditorPart, come tutti gli altri <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli, si trova in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>zona può contenere solo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli non possono essere inseriti in qualsiasi altro tipo di zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A> property, which gets or sets the title for a layout control.
trans-unit.target: La classe LayoutEditorPart dispone di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>proprietà, che ottiene o imposta il titolo per un controllo di layout.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The class also has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A> property, which overrides the base property and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: La classe include inoltre un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A>proprietà, che esegue l'override della proprietà di base e restituisce `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that the LayoutEditorPart control is always visible when the page is in edit mode, even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa che il controllo LayoutEditorPart è sempre visibile quando la pagina è in modalità di modifica, anche se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>proprietà il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo modificato è impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: In other words, users can always edit the properties in a LayoutEditorPart control, even if a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control cannot be edited by the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: In altre parole, gli utenti possono sempre modificare le proprietà in un controllo LayoutEditorPart, anche se un oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo non può essere modificato dagli altri <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class also has two important methods, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, which it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class and overrides.
trans-unit.target: La classe LayoutEditorPart presenta anche due metodi importanti <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, che eredita dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe ed esegue l'override.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited.
trans-unit.target: I metodi sono critici in quanto consentono di ottenere e impostare i valori delle proprietà tra i valori dei campi del controllo editor e le proprietà sul <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo in fase di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the LayoutEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:layouteditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Nella maggior parte dei casi, il controllo LayoutEditorPart deve essere utilizzato nel formato di persistenza pagina dichiarando un `<asp:layouteditorpart>` elemento all'interno di un `<zonetemplate>` elemento, che a sua volta è contenuto in un `<asp:editorzone>` elemento in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo LayoutEditorPart consente agli utenti di modificare le proprietà seguenti dell'interfaccia utente di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>per modificare altre proprietà e comportamenti di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli, è possibile utilizzare gli altri <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli forniti con il set di controlli Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Questi controlli includono il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornito <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli devono fornire la maggior parte delle funzionalità di modifica necessarie per modificare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>i controlli, ma è anche possibile creare un controllo editor personalizzato ereditando dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di codice, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Cenni preliminari sulla classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the LayoutEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Per migliorare l'accessibilità, viene eseguito il rendering del controllo LayoutEditorPart all'interno di un `<fieldset>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the LayoutEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: Il `<fieldset>` elemento raggruppa il set correlato di controlli utilizzati per la modifica del controllo LayoutEditorPart e facilita la navigazione a schede tra i controlli per gli agenti utente visivo (ad esempio i normali browser Web) e gli agenti utente di riconoscimento vocale (ad esempio un software di lettura dello schermo).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Accessibilità markup sottoposto a rendering per impostazione predefinita per questo controllo potrebbe non essere conforme agli standard di accessibilità, ad esempio le linee guida priorità 1 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG).

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sul supporto di accessibilità per questo controllo, vedere [controlli ASP.NET e l'accessibilità](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore LayoutEditorPart è predefinito. Nessun costruttore viene dichiarato nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>classe e pertanto non speciale attività vengono eseguite quando viene creata una nuova istanza della classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control to a page declaratively at design time.
trans-unit.target: In genere non occorre utilizzare il costruttore, poiché è possibile aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controllo a una pagina in modo dichiarativo in fase di progettazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control programmatically for some reason, you can use the LayoutEditorPart constructor.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se è necessario aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controllo a livello di codice per qualche motivo, è possibile utilizzare il costruttore LayoutEditorPart.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Salva i valori di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> controllo alle proprietà corrispondenti nell'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ApplyChanges è di importanza critica in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Lo scopo del metodo consiste nel salvare i valori di un utente è impostato su un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controllo alle proprietà corrispondenti nell'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo associato viene fatto riferimento nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>ereditata del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > You cannot call the ApplyChanges method from your own code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > È possibile chiamare il metodo ApplyChanges dal codice.

trans-unit.source: However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control provides, you can create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control and provide your own implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se è necessario un controllo più preciso il processo di modifica delle varie <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllare le proprietà del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>fornisce controllo, è possibile creare un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controllare e fornire la propria implementazione di questo metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set the following properties on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ApplyChanges tenta di impostare le proprietà seguenti sull'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>ApplyChanges il metodo viene chiamato quando l'utente sceglie un pulsante che rappresenta un OK o Applica nell'interfaccia utente (UI) modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'azione di salvataggio dei valori di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> controllo il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo ha esito positivo; in caso contrario (se si verifica un errore), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when setting the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*> property on the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un errore quando si imposta il valore di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*>proprietà sull'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override della proprietà di base ereditata dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controllo per nascondere la proprietà dalle finestre di progettazione e impedire che venga modificata dai temi.

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: Anche se è pubblico, questa proprietà viene utilizzata per il rendering predefinito di questo controllo e non deve essere chiamato dal codice dello sviluppatore.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non può essere impostata da temi o temi di fogli di stile.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [ASP.NET temi e interfacce](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that receives the default focus in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'ID del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref> controllo che riceve lo stato attivo predefinito in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se un controllo deve essere visualizzato quando l'identificatore associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo si trova nella modalità di modifica.

trans-unit.source: The Display property returns `true` even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property is `false` on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di visualizzazione restituisce `true` anche se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>proprietà `false` sull'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control can always be available in edit mode, even when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control cannot be edited by the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta in modo che il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controllo possono sempre essere disponibili in modalità di modifica, anche quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo non può essere modificato dagli altri <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se il controllo deve essere visualizzato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera i valori di proprietà da un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllare e li assegna all'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SyncChanges è di importanza critica in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the child controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>metodo dalla classe di base, recupera i valori correnti da associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo e gli aggiornamenti i controlli figlio nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controllo con tali valori in modo che un utente può modificarli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SyncChanges viene chiamato ogni volta che i valori associati <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo potrebbe essere state modificate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>(controllo), il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>area che contiene il controllo chiama il metodo SyncChanges immediatamente dopo la chiamata di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>(metodo), in modo che i valori nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controllo sono sempre sincronizzate con i valori nell'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is initially entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Un altro caso in cui viene chiamato il metodo SyncChanges è quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo inizialmente passa alla modalità di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un titolo per il controllo dell'editor.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà del titolo viene visualizzato nella barra del titolo di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controllare quando il controllo è visibile in modalità di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando il controllo viene dichiarato in una pagina, è possibile impostare un valore per il `Title` attributo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per il titolo, un valore specifico delle impostazioni cultura predefinito viene utilizzato per descrivere le proprietà che questo controllo consente agli utenti di modificare.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che viene utilizzata come il titolo del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è un nome di controllo calcolato fornito dal set di controlli Web part.
